solution_line_template: For the first {first_days_count} days, he pays {first_days_count} * ${hostel_cost_per_night} = $<<{first_days_count}*{hostel_cost_per_night}={cost_first_period}>>{cost_first_period}

The next {next_days_count} days, he and his friends pay ${cabin_total_cost_per_night} * {next_days_count} =$<<{cabin_total_cost_per_night}*{next_days_count}={total_cabin_cost_friends}>>{total_cabin_cost_friends}

Jimmy and his {number_of_friends} friends pay ${total_cabin_cost_friends} / {total_people_sharing} = $<<{total_cabin_cost_friends}/{total_people_sharing}={jimmy_cabin_share}>>{jimmy_cabin_share} each.
